sentences: Kaks inimest vaikselt usuks ja tõmbusid laiali.
Ta torkas usuks käesolevalt, et keegi ei näha.
Nad jooksisid usuks ja piinasid oma mängu.
Usun, et sa lamasid neist usuks!
context: In Estonian context 'usuks' usually means to the corner or into the corner. It is commonly used in situations where someone hides or moves towards a corner to avoid being seen or as a strategic place.
